body.name: HNEBC Auto LED Nightstand with Charging Station, Smart Night Stand with Wirelss/USB/Type-C, Bedside Table with Body Sensing Lights (White)
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 8 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 8 mins
features: 🎄【Multiple Modes Charging Station】This nightstand has 3-mode USB & Type-C & Wireless charging station for you to accommodate for your phone, earphone, desk lamp, and other electrical appliances, so you don't have to worry about finding a charging station!

🎄【Intelligent Body Sensing LED Light】HNEBC night stand designed with auto-sensing mode, the LED lights up automatically when you approach and turns off automatically when you leave.The light can also be manually control by a button; 3 level brightness adjusted, 3 colors changing: white/blue/yellow.

🎄【Large Storage Space】This bedside table is equipped with 1 open shelf and 2 space compartments that can be closed, which provide plenty of storage space for organizing books, keys, remote and other small items. The wood top is ideal to place alarm clock, phone, charger, eyeglasses, keeping them in your reach.

🎄【Sturdy and Durable】This LED nightstand is made of high-quality MDF board and high-end acrylic, durable and good-looking style to better match your home life. This stylish nightstand is suitable for most decoration styles, can be used as a end table, bedside table is suitable for bedroom, living room, office, and etc.

🎄【Easy Assemble & Excellent Customer Service】This side table is easy to assemble without any installation skills. If there are any damaged or missing parts, you can replace the parts free of charge. If you have any questions, please leave us a message via Amazon.
body.description: CHARGING STATION Wireless Charging The embedded intelligent module uses the design of 15W wireless charging. The wireless charging plane and desktop are flat and perfectly embedded in the panel. The use effect is very good! USB/Type-C Port We have designed a variety of charging modes to meet your mobile phone, tablet and other charging needs! Touch Button You can set the lighting control mode through the buttons: body sensing/manual; You can also adjust the brightness and color of the light by pushing buttons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a decent price
reviews.reviewText: The nightstand was super simple and easy to put together. It took me less than an hour. It was also packaged great with no loose pieces and came with a screw driver just in case. I think the wireless phone charging feature and the light dimming feature are my favorites.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Thus is way better than I expected. Only issue I have is it doesn't charge newer phones very well. Other than that very nice product.

reviews.reviewerName: Works really good , bought it for a family member for Christmas, they really enjoy it
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works good , pain to put together, and the charging sensor isn’t the best but it works

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t even had this 4 months and it doesn’t work anymore. I plug it in the outlet and it doesn’t light up and USB ports don’t work. VERY disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, and it looks great
reviews.reviewText: Took about 30 minutes to put together. Works great so far! Very modern look!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They had one job !!
reviews.reviewText: Let me just start off by saying that this is a very nice and good quality nightstand. I decided I wanted to do my daughters room over and brought this night stand to go with the decor. My partner purchased one as well for Christmas for her so she could have one on each side of her bed. The one that my partner brought was built first and there wasn’t any issues with putting it together or with any of the pieces. Very easy and quick to put together. Once she was finished with that one she started to put together the one I purchased. Half way through the build she noticed that a piece that’s suppose to be at the front bottom of the dresser, wasn’t painted at all like the other pieces. They forgot to paint the side that’s visible. If it wasn’t visible I wouldn’t really care but it’s an all white dresser. Overall it’s a great nightstand. I wish I didn’t have to paint it myself but taking it apart and sending it back isn’t happening. Just make sure before putting it together check all the sides of the pieces to make sure they are painted or damaged. The crazy thing is we didn’t even see that side because it was face down and the other side of it which was painted was facing upwards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Personally it seemed smaller than I though but that’s okay. It was very easy to put together instructions were very detailed and helpful. I put the whole thing together in a matter of 20 minutes. The wireless charger is a bit particular on where you have to place your device but it works great definitely pleased with my purchase
